name: @magda/combined-db
description: A container that combined all MAGDA's Postgres databases, for use locally or in resource-constrained environments

scripts.dev: bash -c "npm run docker-build-local && kubectl config use-context minikube && eval $(minikube docker-env) && kubectl apply -f ../deploy/kubernetes/local/base/combined-db.yml && kubectl port-forward $(kubectl get pods -l service=combined-db -o=custom-columns=NAME:.metadata.name --no-headers) 5432"
